citations.narrative:
The facility has not kept their record of animals on hand (acquisitions and dispositions) up to date. The records kept do
not fully disclose the required information about hedgehogs purchased and disposed of by the facility. Some of the
hedgehogs present at the facility during the last inspection are no longer physically present but the record still indicates
that they are present. In order to allow for medical and legal tracing, records must be complete and correct. Records shall
reflect the name and address of the person from whom animals were acquired, their USDA license/registration number or
their Driver's license number and vehicle tag if not, the name and address of the person to whom an animal was
sold/given, the date of acquisition or disposition, the species and number of animals in the shipment. Correct by 4/10/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
The facility has not kept their record of animals on hand (acquisitions and dispositions) up to date. The records kept do 
not fully disclose the required information about hedgehogs purchased and disposed of by the facility. Some of the 
hedgehogs present at the facility during the last inspection are no longer physically present but the record still indicates 
that they are present. In order to allow for medical and legal tracing, records must be complete and correct. Records shall 
reflect the name and address of the person from whom animals were acquired, their USDA license/registration number or 
their Driver's license number and vehicle tag if not, the name and address of the person to whom an animal was 
sold/given, the date of acquisition or disposition, the species and number of animals in the shipment. Correct by 4/10/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
